action.text: if exists(select 1 from dmkh where ma_kh = @ma_kh and cc_yn = 1) begin select rtrim(a.tk) as tk, b.ten_tk%l, rtrim(a.ma_tt) as ma_tt, c.ten_tt%l, rtrim(doi_tac) as ong_ba, rtrim(a.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.ma_so_thue) as ma_so_thue, rtrim(a.ma_nvbh) as ma_nvbh, d.ten_nvbh%l, rtrim(a.tk_nh) as tk_nh, rtrim(a.ngan_hang) as ngan_hang, rtrim(a.tinh_thanh) as tinh_thanh, rtrim(a.chi_nhanh) as chi_nhanh, rtrim(a.quoc_gia) as quoc_gia from dmkh a left join dmtk b on a.tk = b.tk left join dmtt c on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt left join dmnvbh d on a.ma_nvbh = d.ma_nvbh where a.ma_kh = @ma_kh return end
